arts.ttl: European football: McTominay boosts Napoli title bid, Real Madrid sink Getafe
arts.sum: Midfielder nets winner in 1-0 victory at Torino Bellingham and Mbappé on target for Madrid Scott McTominay’s first-half goal earned leaders Napoli a 1-0 win at Torino as Antonio Conte’s side opened a four-point gap at the top of the Serie A standings. The Scotland midfielder found the net around the half-hour mark when he struck a shot powerfully inside the near post after receiving a precise pass from Khvicha Kvaratskhelia. Napoli move on to 32 points, with four teams level on 28 points: Atalanta, Lazio, Inter and Fiorentina. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: McTominay earns leaders Napoli 1-0 win at Torino
arts.sum: A first half goal by Scott McTominay earned leaders Napoli a 1-0 win at Torino in Serie A on Sunday to keep them clear at the top of the standings.

arts.ttl: McTominay goal gives Serie A leader Napoli win over Torino as Lazio loses ground
arts.sum: Napoli ground out a 1-0 win at Torino to ensure it will end the weekend still top of a tight Serie A table, while at least one of its opponents dropped points on Sunday. Scott McTominay scored the only goal of the match in the first half as Napoli pulled away from one of its closest rivals as Lazio lost 3-1 at relegation-threatened Parma.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Torino 0-1 Napoli: Match Report
arts.sum: Napoli secured a crucial 1-0 victory against Torino, maintaining their position at the top of Serie A. The post Serie A | Torino 0-1 Napoli: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.sum: Federico Chiesa's stint at Liverpool has been far from smooth sailing, with the Italian forward struggling to adapt to the intensity of the Premier League. The post Chiesa struggles in Premier League, Napoli emerge as potential suitor appeared first on FootItalia.com.
